title: Design Matters with Debbie Millman: It's Nice That
description: Debbie talks to the design duo of Alex Bec and Will Hudson of It’s Nice That about their close friendship, long collaboration, and about what they’ve learned along the way.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to the design duo of Alex Bec and Will Hudson of It’s Nice That about their close friendship, long collaboration, and about what  they’ve learned along the way.
